Should link to each function.

|-------------------+-----------+-----------+-------+--------+---------------------------------------|
| Signature         | condition | Tags      | Log   | Dest   | Comments                              |
|                   |           |           | Level |        |                                       |
|-------------------+-----------+-----------+-------+--------+---------------------------------------|
| [[b_io.note(*obj)]]   | Always    | "[N]: "   | All   | stderr | Not used for errors. Proved xtra info |
| [[b_io.stderr]](*obj) | Always    | ""        | All   | stderr | Writes to fileno-2                    |
| b_io.error        | Always    | "[E]: "   | All   | stderr | Prefixed. FileNo2.                    |
| b_io.stdout       | Always    | ""        | All   | stdout | Same as print                         |
| b_io.pr           | Always    |           |       | stdout |                                       |
| b_io.output       | Always    | "[O]: "   | All   | stdout | Prefixed. Same as print.              |
|-------------------+-----------+-----------+-------+--------+---------------------------------------|
| b_io.tm_          | [[tracing]]   | File,line |       |        | For Debugging                         |
|-------------------+-----------+-----------+-------+--------+---------------------------------------|
| b_io.eh.          |           |           |       |        | Error Handeling                       |
|-------------------+-----------+-----------+-------+--------+---------------------------------------|
| b_io.xh.          |           |           |       |        | Exception Handeling                   |
|-------------------+-----------+-----------+-------+--------+---------------------------------------|
| Func Entry/exit   |           |           | 10    |        |                                       |
| CS Sys Reports    |           |           | xx    |        |                                       |
| Cmnd Exec Reports |           |           | yy    |        |                                       |
| Invoker Reports   |           |           | zz    |        |                                       |
| Performer rep     |           |           | nn    |        |                                       |
|-------------------+-----------+-----------+-------+--------+---------------------------------------|
| logging           |           |           |       |        |                                       |
|-------------------+-----------+-----------+-------+--------+---------------------------------------|
